caption.title: Variation in species suitability between the transition Pleistocene-Holocene.
caption.p: (a) Biotic stability (Component A), cells where mammals occur in both present-day and LGM. (b) Biotic gain, cells where mammals did not occur in the LGM but occur in present-day. (c) Biotic loss, cells where mammals were present in the LGM but lost in present-day. (d) Proportional loss of mammals, calculated by B/A+B. Maps made with Natural Earth.
